Title: Postinor-2: How to know if you are buying fake drugs
Summary: A fake version of the emergency contraceptive pill, Postinor-2, is now in circulation in Nigeria . The National Agency for Food and Drug Administration and Control (NAFDAC) has confirmed that a fake version is in circulation . Title: Delta@34: Oborevwori tasks residents on building prosperous state
Summary: Governor, Sheriff Oborevwori, has called on citizens and residents of Delta State to remain united, peaceful, and committed to building a greater and more prosperous state .

Title: 80% to lose admission due to withheld results by WAEC – Ogah
Summary: Hon. Chinedu Ogah said nearly 80 per cent of Nigerian youths who sat for the exam risk missing admission into tertiary institutions this year . Ogah is the Member representing Ikwo/Ezza South Federal Constituency of Ebonyi State . He said WAEC continued withholding of some results by the West African Examination Council

Title: CBN orders geo-tagging of PoS terminals
Summary: CBN orders geo-tagging of PoS terminals across the country within 60 days . The bank said the measure is aimed at curbing fraud and reducing fraud . In a statement dated August 26, the bank said it is a step to curb fraud .

Title: Air Peace begins Lagos–São Paulo flight after Tinubu’s Brazil deal
Summary: Nigerian airline Air Peace has launched a direct service between Lagos and São Paulo . Air Peace follows an aviation agreement signed between Nigeria and Brazil . The inaugural flight carried members of Air Peace .

Title: Becoming bank branch manager at 27 changed course of my life – Tony Elumelu
Summary: Tony O. Elumu recalls how becoming a bank branch manager at 27 changed course of his career . Chairman of Heirs Holdings and founder of the Tony Elumumu Foundation, Mr. Eyoyo, has reflected on the pivotal moment that shaped his life .

Title: We may not honour meetings with FG until agreements are implemented – ASUU
Summary: The union described as nauseating and unacceptable the government's antics of summoning meetings with its leadership, and the resolutions reached at such meetings are not honoured .

Title: Imo workers celebrate as Uzodimma increases minimum wage to N104,000
Summary: Imo workers erupted in celebration Tuesday night after Governor Hope Uzodimma raised the state’s minimum wage from the nationally approved N70,000 to N104,000 .

Title: EFCC arrests 37 suspected internet fraudsters in Taraba
Summary: operatives from the Makurdi Zonal Directorate arrested the suspects behind the Federal University, Wukari, Taraba, on Wednesday . Oyewale stated the suspects were arrested .

Title: 4 Best Crypto to Buy in 2025: Why BlockDAG Leads the Charge
Summary: BlockDAG, BONK, VET, and ADA Named the Best Crypto to Buy in 2025 for the Coming Bull Run . Developers are migrating toward platforms that offer better throughput, lower costs, and user-friendly design . The hunt for the best crypto to buy in 2025 is underway .

Summary: The News Agency of Nigeria reports that the presidential jet took off from Brasília International Airport Air Force Base at about 12:57 pm (local time) Tinubu was received with full military honours and met with President Luiz Inácio Lula da Silva and senior Brazilian officials . Title: Nutrition experts warn Nigerians against consuming unbranded vegetable oil
Summary: Nutrition experts in Abia State have urged pregnant women, nursing mothers, and children to consume healthy diets prepared with fortified vegetable oil . Title: Yilwatda declares Ganduje ‘Co-Chairman’, seeks his experience to strengthen APC
Summary: National Chairman of the All Progressives Congress, Nentawe Yilwatda, has described his predecessor, Abdullahi Ganduje, as “Co-Chairman” of the ruling party . Yilwattda said he would rely heavily on Ganduja’s experience, guidance, and political networks

Title: No economy can thrive without robust transport system - Plateau gov
Summary: Stakeholders in Nigeria’s North Central region are calling for urgent improvements in transport infrastructure to boost economic growth, foster peace, and enhance regional integration . The appeal was made during the opening of the three-day North Central Conference of the Chartered Institute of Transport Administration of Nigeria .

Summary: Gunman opened fire on school children attending church in Minneapolis, killing two pupils and wounding 17 people .
